SELECT ai.`activity_name`, ai.`activity_num`, ai.`start_date`, ai.end_date, ai.id activity_id, am.`marine_name`, am.id marine_id, cs.`child_name` FROM t_parent_info pa INNER JOIN t_child_sign_info cs ON cs.family_no = pa.family_no INNER JOIN t_activity_child ac ON ac.child_id = cs.id INNER JOIN t_activity_marines am ON am.`id` = ac.`marine_id` INNER JOIN t_activity_info ai ON ai.`id` = am.`activity_id` WHERE ac.`is_delete` = 'N' AND ai.`is_delete`='N' AND pa.`openid` = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by start_date desc

SELECT tp.`id`, tp.`parent_name`, tp.`wechat_num`, tp.openid, tp.head_img, po.`res_amount` FROM t_parent_info tp INNER JOIN t_product_order po ON po.`cust_id` = tp.`id` WHERE po.`product_type`='COURSE' AND po.order_status = '000' AND po.`product_id` = #{params.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY po.create_time DESC
